name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 422 — Limited Energy Window for Work Continuity
description:
On January 1, 2026 at 08:04, MaMeeFarm™ activated the household hybrid solar inverter to supply electricity for daily work activities.

Due to energy storage limitations, the available working window is constrained to approximately 08:00–23:00 each day.
When stored power is depleted, all work must stop.

This record documents a real operational constraint — not a failure, but a boundary condition under which work continues.

DGCP captures not only actions, but the limits that shape those actions.
